MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: $folderName="<folder name, such as C:\Azure\Templates\SharePointFarm>" $webclient = New-Object System.Net.WebClient $url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/master/sharepoint-three-vm/azuredeploy.json" $filePath = $folderName + "\azuredeploy.json" $webclient.DownloadFile($url,$filePath)
